io.requery.converter

Class LocalDateConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.requery.converter.LocalDateConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Converter<LocalDate,Date>

    public class LocalDateConverter
extends Object
implements Converter<LocalDate,Date>
    Converts from a LocalDate to a Date for Java 8.
